# None

**Enumeration Case**

A flag that indicates starting or stopping for normal I/O operation.

## Declaration

```swift
None
```

## Discussion

This option results in enabling or disabling all necessary hardware.

## Start/Stop Behaviors

- **Prewarm**: A flag that indicates starting or stopping for prewarming.

items.description: A flag that indicates starting or stopping for prewarming.
